definition: with no regard for law or discipline (idiom); flouting the law and disregarding all rules/in complete disorder
France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])

sentences.english: That should put the fear of the law in any wayward person.
sentences.chinese: 這將使每個目無法紀之徒都對法律充滿恐懼。
